Our mission is to give people the power to share and to make the world more open and connected. We want everyone to feel safe when using Facebook.   We work with external experts, including a  Safety Advisory Board , and gather feedback from our community to develop policies, tools and resources to keep you safe. Learn More Learn More Policies  Our Community Standards and related policies aim to find the right balance between giving people a place to express themselves and promoting a welcoming and safe environment for everyone.  Learn More Tools  Facebook gives people control over what they share, who they share it with, the content they see and experience, and who can contact them.  Learn More Resources  We work with safety experts around the world to provide the resources you need to stay safe.
